nodes.text: Fhorjak  was a male Duros colonel of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. In 3640 BBY he served as the shipboard security onboard the Valor-class cruiser Gav Daragon, where he connected Republic forces with a holocommunication by Jedi Master Shol Bestros concerning Soa, The Infernal One.
Colonel Fhorjak appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as the Operation Courier for "The Eternity Vault" operation.
